claim: In the year 2020, the metric represented by the blue bar reaches above 5.

claim: The Green Bay Packers had expenses of $376.1 million in 2017.

This specific value aligns perfectly with the data point referenced in the question and answer pair, thereby affirming the accuracy of the claim as supported by the chart.
